name: Keys to my Heart
description:
• Warning: Sometimes the game does not accept keypresses :(. Refresh page if you encounter this issue. Thanks <3.

You are Beth and you absolutely love your boyfriend, Sam. However, he sometimes can speak quite quickly and he says a little bit too much. Try and help Beth understand what he is saying and keep the date going as long as possible!

Keys to My Heart is a game about connecting and communicating with your companion. Sometimes it can be tough to remember what he or she said but all we can try is our best.
